summary: Adds recipes to transform iron into gold and silver, and the other way around in furnaces.
descriptionHtml:
[i]Transmutation? Ha! Never again! Your arcaic character can stay out of magic safely even for easy smithing level up!
[/i]
This mod is simple, very handy and will make that you will not have to waste more time with the transmutation spell.

It adds [u]mainly[/u] 2 recipes, but four more to the furnaces for easier smelting:
[u]Iron ore to Silver ore[/u]
[u]Iron ore to Gold ore[/u]
Gold ore to Iron ore
Silver ore into Iron ore
Iron ingot to Gold ore
Iron ingot into Silver ore
Iron ingot to Iron ore
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
To do list:
[s]Thumbnail and ingame crafting images
Gold ore into Iron ore
Silver ore into Iron ore
Iron ingot to Gold ore
Iron ingot into Silver ore
Iron ingot to Iron ore[/s]
- All done, i'm open for recommendations...
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I'm open for any suggestion, idea or recommendation, you can [u]leave them in the comments[/u]
Or maybe you find a bug, an exploit or something that you want to share with anyone that
sees this mod, just leave them in the comments too! I would love to troublefix my mods so 
I can get a little better at moding for the next possible mod I make!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

author: Alesnyper

files.name: Iron Smelting
files.changelogHtml:
Iron Transmutation created.
Added recipes: Gold ore to Iron ore - Silver ore to Iron ore - Iron ingot to Gold ore - Iron ingot to Silver ore
Tweaked the description and added new recipe: Iron ingot to Iron ore.
Changed name from Iron Transmutation to Iron Smelting, it fits better with what it does.
